messages.subject: Re: Re: Aizu 2004 Compilation Movie
messages.msgSnippet: ... FYI The scenes that appear in that video are (in sequence): Shimizu-ya Amida-ji (+ Gosankai) Tsurugajo Castle view from Tsurugajo Aizu-han-ko gyoretsu
messages.messageBody:
> the movie contains S.H.'s memorial service (in the
> middle and near
> the end) and lots and lots of cosplayers and even
> the now popular
> dog dressed in a light blue T-shirt


FYI

The scenes that appear in that video are (in
sequence):

Shimizu-ya
Amida-ji (+ Gosankai)
Tsurugajo Castle
view from Tsurugajo
Aizu-han-ko gyoretsu (Aizu parade)
Kondo Isami's grave at Tenneiji
Matsudaira clan grave
Byakkotai memorial service + kenbu
Old Takizawa headquarters
Nanoka-machi doori (avenue where Amida-ji is)
Aizu Shinsengumi matsuri (Aizu Wakamatsu)
Dog :D
Saito Hajime memorial service (+ Mugai-ryu enbu)
Shinsengumi summit

I have a picture of that Shimizu-ya stone and
explanation. I created a folder named Aizu Wakamatsu
in the Photos section and put some pics there for
those who are interested.

Serizawa Kamo

messages.subject: Re: Aizu 2004 Compilation Movie (hosted on streamload)
messages.msgSnippet: Wounds has kindly offered to host the movie. http://www.streamload.com/green_2 password: miburo file: aizu.wmv listen to the [audio] to hear S.H. name/title
messages.messageBody:
Wounds has kindly offered to host the movie.
http://www.streamload.com/green_2
password: miburo
file: "aizu.wmv" listen to the [audio] to hear S.H. name/title in
the narration
size: 42.5 mb (once you download it please save it or burn to a CD
please don't keep downloading because it will obviously deduct from
Wounds' account)

the original site http://www.the-shinsengumi.com/douga18.htm
works fine if you have a LAN or Ethernet connection and the movie is
streaming however if you have an inferior (^_^) internet connection
it may be easier to download it from streamload.

the movie contains S.H.'s memorial service (in the middle and near
the end) and lots and lots of cosplayers and even the now popular
dog dressed in a light blue T-shirt

secretarytocapt3
AIM = badgerturtle
